TempSensorOptions
TempSensorOptions

Options to adjust the temperature sensor for a WirelessNode.

Thermocouple
static TempSensorOptions Thermocouple(
WirelessTypes::
ThermocoupleType 
thermocouple
)

Creates a TempSensorOptions object with Thermocouple options.

Parameters
thermocouple
WirelessTypes::ThermocoupleType

The WirelessTypes::ThermocoupleType to set.

RTD
static TempSensorOptions RTD(
WirelessTypes::
RtdWireType 
wire,
WirelessTypes::
RtdType 
rtd
)

Creates a TempSensorOptions object with RTD options.

Parameters
wire
WirelessTypes::RtdWireType

The WirelessTypes::RtdWireType to set.

rtd
WirelessTypes::RtdType

The WirelessTypes::RtdType to set.

Thermistor
static TempSensorOptions Thermistor(
WirelessTypes::
ThermistorType 
thermistor
)

Creates a TempSensorOptions object with Thermistor options.

Parameters
thermistor
WirelessTypes::ThermistorType

The WirelessTypes::ThermistorType to set.

transducerType
WirelessTypes::TransducerType transducerType() const

Gets the WirelessTypes::TransducerType set in this options object.

thermocoupleType
WirelessTypes::ThermocoupleType thermocoupleType() const

Gets the WirelessTypes::ThermocoupleType set in this options object.  Note: this is only valid if transducerType returns <WirelessTypes::TransducerType::transducer_thermocouple>.

rtdType
WirelessTypes::RtdType rtdType() const

Gets the WirelessTypes::RtdType set in this options object.  Note: this is only valid if transducerType returns <WirelessTypes::TransducerType::transducer_rtd>.

rtdWireType
WirelessTypes::RtdWireType rtdWireType() const

Gets the WirelessTypes::RtdWireType set in this options object.  Note: this is only valid if transducerType returns <WirelessTypes::TransducerType::transducer_rtd>.

thermistorType
WirelessTypes::ThermistorType thermistorType() const

Gets the WirelessTypes::ThermistorType set in this options object.  Note: this is only valid if transducerType returns <WirelessTypes::TransducerType::transducer_thermistor>.
